dcterms:creator: Christiane Fellbaum
Anne Osherson
Peter E. Clark
dcterms:description: The core training data comprise 6,641 morphosemantically related verb-noun literal pairs from BulNet, which were preprocessed quality-wise and supplemented with negative examples.
dcterms:title: BulNet

dcterms:creator: Svetla Koeva
Svetlozara Leseva
Ivelina Stoyanova
Tsvetana Dimitrova
Maria Todorova
dcterms:description: The dataset includes 17,740 links connecting 14,877 unique synset pairs, mapping morphosemantic relations from PWN to Bulgarian WordNet.
dcterms:title: PWN (Princeston WordNet)

dcterms:creator: Svetla Koeva
Cvetana Krstev
Dusko Vitas
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 6,220 instances of derivationally related verb-noun literal pairs in Bulgarian WordNet, manually validated.
dcterms:title: BulNet (Bulgarian WordNet)

dcterms:creator: Svetla Koeva
Svetlozara Leseva
Ivelina Stoyanova
Tsvetana Dimitrova
Maria Todorova
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 21,094 examples of verb-noun pairs that do not have a morphosemantic relation, extracted from BulNet.
dcterms:title: Negative Examples Dataset
